function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

function resetModalToInitialState(currentMonth, currentDate, currentYear) {
var enableOnlineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineRadio’);
var enableOfflineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineRadio’);

var offlineStoreName = document.querySelector(‘#offlineStoreName’);
var offlineCity = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCity’);
var offlineState = document.querySelector(‘#offlineState’);
var offlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#offlinePriceRaw’);
var offlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#offlineDay’);
var offlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#offlineMonth’);
var offlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#offlineYear’);
var offlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCalendar’);

var thankYouDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_thank’);
var errorDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_error’);
var submitButton = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_submit’);
var loadingGifDiv = document.querySelector(‘#loading’);

var stateDefaultOption = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultOption’);
var stateDefaultPrompt = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultPrompt’);

if (thankYouDiv) {
thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {
errorDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (loadingGifDiv) {
loadingGifDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (submitButton) {
submitButton.style.display = ‘block’;
}
onlineUrl.value = ”;
onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;
onlineShippingRaw.value = ”;
offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,
offlineDay,
onlineYear,
currentYear,
offlineYear,
onlineStoreInputForm,
offlineStoreInputForm,

enableOnlineStoreRadio,
onlineCalendar,
offlineCalendar
);
}

Price: $17.99 - $16.89
(as of Nov 30,2022 09:55:58 UTC – Details)

Product Description

CUMKA Professional Led Desk Lamp Designed for Your Bright and Clear Life

CUMKA led desk light with usb charging port equipped 52 PCS eye protection LED, there is no flicker and no shadow, soft light that protects your eyes.
Professional office desk lamp with quality head and arm, non-slip bottom make CUMKA desk lamp sturdy and modern.
Long desk lamp head, cast a broader span of light .With the premium heat sink, which makes the usb desk lamp have better heat dissipation function and extend the lifespan of the desk lamp. Stable led desk light, non-flickering light, no harsh glare.
Memory function of desk Lamp would store the mode used last time, no need to readjust it when you turn it on next time.
LED desk lamp can be given to anyone you love and care as a gift on any occasion and festival, such as birthday and various festivals.

Warm and Soft Light Led Desk Lamp, No Flicker Touch Control Desk Lights with Smart Memory Function

*Desk Lamp Specifications

Max Power Voltage: 100V-240V, 50/60Hz

Power Output: 7W

Lumens: 650 LM

5 Color Temperatures: 3000-6000k

*Packing List

1 x Desk Lamp

1 x USB Power Cable

1 x User Manual

*One more USB charging port LED desk lamp help to charge another device when working, studying, reading.

*LED desk lamp with 5 color temperatures and 10 brightness levels to choose from warm light to cool white (3000K-6000K).

*Table lamp desk light with 30/60 mins of automatic timing setting, energy-saving and auto turn off when the time is up.

*Smooth surface with slide and touch control is easy to turn on/off, adjust color mode or brightness, set timing off.

*CUMKA LED Desk lamp with 50000 hours long lifespan ensure long time useage without changing the LED.

*Adjustable & Foldable desk lamps easy to tilt the head up 225°, arm down 90° and base swivels 160 ° to provide the best lighting angle. Easy fold flat to carry and space saving.

Wide Application Desk Lamps for Home Office School for Reading Studying Working

Various Lighting Modes & Eye-Friendly LEDCUMKA table lamp has 5 color temperatures (from 3000K to 6000K), each with 10 brightness levels,which equals 50 modes, just easily and quickly via sensitive touch sensor switch to adjust. This led lamp is perfect for work,reading and study. Desk lamp with usb charging port has energy-saving full-spectrum LED beads with soft eye protection features to relieve eye fatigue,no flicker,no shadow characteristics,meeting your needs in different environments.
Auto Timer Setting & Memory FunctionCUMKA small desk lamp has 30/60 minutes automatic light off timer, even when you fall asleep under the reading lamp while reading at night, the set time will automatically turn off the light when it’s up, saving power. The led desk lamp also has a memory function that allows you to memorize the color and brightness of the light and adjust it freely, making it easy to store your personal settings for the next use.
Multi-Angle Adjustments & Space SavingThe head of the office desk lamp can be rotated 225°, the arm can be folded 90°, the swivel base can be rotated 160° ，making the lighting more flexible, so it can be adjusted to any lighting angle you need at a large angle. The base of the led desk lamps measure 7×4.3 inches, this office lighting takes up little space on the table, but it can light up a large area. The desk lights are perfect for use in living room, reading room, bedroom, office, etc.
Long Lifespan & After-Sales ServiceCUMKA wireless charging lamp have a lifespan of 50000 hours, never need replace a bulb,40 times longer than a typical incandescent light, reducing energy consumption and saving power, we also provide a power cable for faster and more stable charging. We offer a 12-month warranty, if you have any questions about the desk lamps, please contact us anytime.

CUMKA Professional Led Desk Lamp Designed for Your Bright and Clear Life


  • CUMKA led desk light with usb charging port equipped 52 PCS eye protection LED, there is no flicker and no shadow, soft light that protects your eyes.
  • Professional office desk lamp with quality head and arm, non-slip bottom make CUMKA desk lamp sturdy and modern.
  • Long desk lamp head, cast a broader span of light .With the premium heat sink, which makes the usb desk lamp have better heat dissipation function and extend the lifespan of the desk lamp. Stable led desk light, non-flickering light, no harsh glare.
  • Memory function of desk Lamp would store the mode used last time, no need to readjust it when you turn it on next time.
  • LED desk lamp can be given to anyone you love and care as a gift on any occasion and festival, such as birthday and various festivals.


Warm and Soft Light Led Desk Lamp, No Flicker Touch Control Desk Lights with Smart Memory Function

*Desk Lamp Specifications

Max Power Voltage: 100V-240V, 50/60Hz

Power Output: 7W

Lumens: 650 LM

5 Color Temperatures: 3000-6000k

*Packing List

1 x Desk Lamp

1 x USB Power Cable

1 x User Manual




*One more USB charging port LED desk lamp help to charge another device when working, studying, reading.

*LED desk lamp with 5 color temperatures and 10 brightness levels to choose from warm light to cool white (3000K-6000K).

*Table lamp desk light with 30/60 mins of automatic timing setting, energy-saving and auto turn off when the time is up.

item.title: Lutron Caséta Wireless Smart Lighting Lamp Dimmer | PD-3PCL-WH
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) PEACE OF MIND: Set lights to automatically adjust with seasons so your family always comes back to a well-lit home; enable smart away to randomly turn your lights on/off to look like you’re home even if you’re away (Caséta Smart Hub, L-BDG2-WH, required)MOST CONNECTED: Caséta connects with more leading smart ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $44.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 09:13:17 UTC – Details)



PEACE OF MIND: Set lights to automatically adjust with seasons so your family always comes back to a well-lit home; enable smart away to randomly turn your lights on/off to look like you’re home even if you’re away (Caséta Smart Hub, L-BDG2-WH, required)
MOST CONNECTED: Caséta connects with more leading smart home devices – including Amazon Alexa, Apple HomeKit, the Google Assistant, Ring, Serena shades and Sonos – than any other smart lighting control brand (Caséta Smart Hub required)
CONTROL YOUR WAY: Caséta puts the smarts in the switch so you can control a variety of ways – via the free Lutron app, your voice or from the switch; schedule lights to change at set times or activate scenes with the touch of a button (Caséta Smart Hub required)
GET MORE, SPEND LESS: One Caséta smart switch can control many bulbs at once; make many bulbs smart, even your existing bulbs; get smart control of multiple styles of dimmable LED, incandescent and halogen bulbs
SMART CONTROL OF PLUG-IN LAMPS: Simply plugs into a standard outlet and can be used with up to 2 floor or table lamps
WIRELESS REMOTE CONTROL: For added convenience, use with wireless Pico remote (PJ2-3BRL-GXX-L01) to turn your lights on, off, or dim and brighten with the touch of a button from anywhere in the home
EASY 3-WAY SETUP: Create a 3-way by mounting Pico to almost any wall surface – no cutting holes or pulling wire, with a wall mount bracket (PICO-WBX-ADAPT sold separately). Replace existing 3-way switches by mounting the bracket and Pico over the backbox

4.5
Price: $44.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 09:13:17 UTC – Details)

item.title: LB3 Smart Lamp, LED Bedside Touch Lamps Compatible with Alexa and Google Home, App Go_sund Control, RGB Color Changing Dimmable & Warm White Night Light for Bedroom, USB Powered
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Smartphone Control: Connect smart lamp with Go_sund_App to manage smart home conveniently. Feel free to power on/off, dim brightness, change colors or scenes of the table lamp with easy control via App. Only support 2.4GHz WiFi, no hub requiredHands-Free Voice Control: The bedside lamp works with Alexa and Google Home ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $18.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:25:25 UTC – Details)



Smartphone Control: Connect smart lamp with Go_sund_App to manage smart home conveniently. Feel free to power on/off, dim brightness, change colors or scenes of the table lamp with easy control via App. Only support 2.4GHz WiFi, no hub required
Hands-Free Voice Control: The bedside lamp works with Alexa and Google Home to free up your hands; You can switch on/off and even change the colors of your lamp by simple voice command. No worries about can’t find the light switch when you walk into a dark room.
Tap Top to Power on/off: The creative built-in touch sensor allows you to tap twice on the top of the lamp to turn it on or off. Manually work with the slide area to change brightness and colors. It is convenient to switch white and color modes with the front button directly
16 Million Colors and 8 Scenes: With 16 million colors, you can select any color in the spectrum via your phone App to create an atmosphere such as a romantic dinner or warm sleep. Scenes are able to be created for your desired ambiance, like multiple colors, 1% – 100% brightness, and color-changing speed.
Timer & Schedule: The smart lamp can be turned on or off automatically according to the time you set. Or set a schedule to turn off the lamp based on your family’s sleep schedule.

4

OUTDOOR & INDOOR CHRISTMAS DECORATIONS!】You’d love this pre-lit snowman Christmas decor if you are finding something attractive and decorative for the coming winter holiday! This lighted snowman would be the perfect decoration for not only indoor but also outdoor with ground stakes, zip ties, water-resistant power cord and adaptor which make it more stable and durable for outside. Attention: this outdoor Christmas decoration is NOT supposed to be used in heavy windy or rainy days.
【OUTDOOR CHRISTMAS DISPLAY】: BOMMETER 3FT Lighted Pop Up Christmas Snowman Decorations, Pre-Lit Light Up 48 LED Cool White Lights, with top hat and green scarf, Collapsible Easily Metal Stand Easy-Assembly Reusable for Holiday Xmas Indoor Outdoor Decor: Garden & Outdoor
【CHRISTMAS THEMED DECORATIONS】: Snowman wears a sparkling red Santa hat and matching scarf. Glitter and sparkles are woven through for a shimmering look. adorable design adds your Christmas and winter great fun, is the perfect Christmas decoration to greet family and this holiday season.
【48 PRE-LIT LED LIGHTS】: This outdoor lighted Snowman features 48 cool white LED lights, create a glowing nighttime display, Battery design for easy use, will brighten up your Christmas decor by creating an attractive focal point in your yard or porch.
【EASY ASSEMBLE AND STORAGE】: This Snowman yard decoration with collapsible design for quick, easy set up and space saving storage, perfect for a small place, no tools or specialized skills are required, please refer to the detailed installation picture on picture 6. If you have any question for install the snowman, please kindly feel free to tell us.
【COLLAPSIBLE CHRISTMAS DECORATIONS】: This Christmas Snowman come in a nice box that can be a Christmas gift for your family and friends, it can be used to decor your office, the living room, dining room or entryway. Great for Christmas themed Party, Christmas indoor and outdoor decorations, or Christmas yard decoration!

There are so many choice, you would find one you like.Suitable for children’s rooms, bedrooms, creating a ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $29.99 - $19.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 07:32:18 UTC – Details)



1【16 Color Sunset Light & 4 Flashing Modes】The sunset lamp projector build-in RGB led, 16 kinds of light effect and 4 dynamic modes(Flash/Strobe/Fade/Smooth Effect) to choose from, provides a comfortable and romantic atmosphere. There are so many choice, you would find one you like.Suitable for children’s rooms, bedrooms, creating a different sunset projector light atmosphere, let you enjoy your leisure time and your family.
2【Smart APP and Remote Control Sunset Lamp】This is a smart sunlight lamp, you can change color of light, adjust brightness of lamp, choose light mode of this sunset lamp projector to make it become a party light or night light through APP on the phone or the remote control; Super convenient and versatile!
3【Portable size Rotatable and Adjustable】The lamp tripod can be rotated and adjusted.The Sunset Lamp head can be rotated 360 degrees, By changing the rotation angle and distance of the illuminator, different circular lights can be emitted from different angles, thereby bringing different effects. The farther the distance is, the larger the projection projected on the wall or ceiling.
4【Widely USE】It is very suitable for use as a background for photos, live broadcast and Vlog video shooting, as well as decoration for bedrooms, living rooms, corridors, cafes, studios, theme restaurants, bars, etc. At the same time, it is also very suitable for occasions such as dating, marriage proposal, parties, birthdays, family celebrations, garden parties and so on.
5 【365 DayQuality Assurance】If you are not 100% satisfied with sunset lights, just contact us and we will refund or replace your product immediately. If you have any questions about our sunlamp, please contact us first, and our support team will try to help you solve all problems…

Christmas Decorations for Porch: cute covers for christmas lights has red nose snowman feature & blushed cheek and lovely smile, it is full of holiday atmosphere, creates a welcome entrance for garages, patios and any other entryways.

From the brand

SHLINUX LIGHTING Brand:

Shlinux always focus the Research and Innovation in lighting industryWe have been adhering to the principle of quality firstOur Team create this kind of desk lamp with remote, very practical and functional!We still make unremitting efforts to create better productsBest Wishes ！

Shlinux Distinct Desk Lamp

White color remote control desk lamp, light up your working station

18W LED 3 Modes 6 Brightness, Modern Desk Light for Home Office

A bright desk lamp suitable for 2 computers lighting. fits nicely behind the monitor, extend up and over to shine on their surface.

【Stepless Dimming with two control ways】 LED lamp has 3 color modes for warm light(3000K), warm white light(4000K), white light(6000K). Each lighting mode has 6 brightness dimming levels. So there are 18 lighting modes to meet all requirements. This architect desk lamp is controlled by touch sensitive switch on lamp bar or a remote controller, very conveniently
【Eye Protection and Memory Function】 Our clamp light is composed of 96 LED beads, it has uniform brightness, NO GLARE, NO FLICKERING, soft light, which can protect eyesight and reduce eye strain, It is ideal for reading, drawing, sewing, working, studying. The clamp desk lamp is a good help for kids & bookworms, one key for reading mode, memory function can keep the mode and brightness last used
【Space Saving and Modern Style】 Task light with sturdy metal clamp, which can support a tabletop thickness up to 2.6 inches. It holds the gooseneck lamp securely in place. The metal clamp is also equipped with a silicone pad to avoid scratching table. The flexible gooseneck study lamp, which can be adjusted 360° to provide multi-directional lighting, and is easy to carry and more save space than stand-up desk lamp
【Quality Warranty】SHLINUX always supply good quality led lamp. what included in box : A Shlinux led desk light, An English Manual & Quality Power Adapter and warranty service, and 24H friendly customer support

SHLINUX Upgrade 18W Bright Led Gooseneck Desk Lamp Illuminate Entire Workbench

SHLINUX clamp lamp has 96 LED Beads,18.2 inch lamp bar in length, offer 1511 Lumen, about 100w incandescent bulb equivalent, to illuminate every corner of your table,Born with 360°adjustable gooseneck design with durable metal clamp, SHLINUX study lamp is fully diffused and lighting stably and gently without flickering, also which can prevent blue light damaged to the eyes.

It is featured with memory function,then your last lighting setting will be turned on again when work lamp was powered-on,very convenient. saving space with a metal clamp supports to 2.6inch/7.5cm wide desk, fix the clamp light where needed, it won’t take any desk space.

It supports 3 colors and 6 brightness levels under each color mode,you will get 18 lighting modes to meet all your daily requirements

EYE-CARING, NO FLICKER, NO GLARE

NO LIMIT LIGHT DIRECTION, NO SHADOW !

Specifications:

Material: metal + silicone

Light bar length: 18.2 inch/ 46 cm

CRI: RA>95

SHLINUX Architect Desk Clamp Lamp

Upgrade Horizontal lighting bar with Flexible Gooseneck

This work light is most suitable for a workbench with 1 or 2 computers, providing enough brightness, the task lamp is light, easy to install, the lighting angle can be adjusted freely, suitable for work, study, reading.

  • No flickering LEDs and diffused lighting gently
  • 360°flexible gooseneck design allow bend to any direction

EASY TO CONTROL THIS MODERN DESK LAMP

Sensitive touch (one key will finish all functions select exclude the timer)

Remote Control

Product Description

Do you want to organize a dazzling party for the coming Christmas?

Our Christmas Projector Lights can help you realize this idea, creating the perfect party atmosphere and giving you a wonderful party with a unique style!

Just place it on the lawn and plug it in, you can cast dynamic patterns on the wall. 16 interchangeable slides, dynamic or static, not only for Christmas but also for Halloween, Easter, weddings, New Year, or birthdays! Decorated with it, your house will attract everyone’s attention at every carnival! Choose it, choose your amazing pleasure!

Place the projector lights 10 to 15ft from the projection surface for better results brightness and visibility.

Ultra-long 3m / 10ft power wire will easily reach most house outlets where you set it. (The darker the surroundings, the better the projection effect).

Package Content:

1x projection lamp

1x ground spike

1x 16 slides

1x user manual

【Easy Installation and Operation】Installation of the projector lamp is very convenient. You only have to loosen the two screws on the lamp body to easily switch the image card. Besides, the stable base is suitable for placing in a position on a level surface. And you can also use the attached ground spike, which is practical for you to install the lamp on the ground or on the lawn.
【IP44 Waterproof & Extreme Weather Resistance 】The IP44 waterproof Christmas projector lamp can withstand heavy rain, cold snow, and hot weather. The thick plastic shell further strengthens the rain cover and protects the lamps.
【Adjustable angle and Images Size】With the 3m long cable, the LED Christmas projector lamp extends the area and image size that can be illuminated. The 180 ° vertical adjustable angle can freely adjust the angle, giving you more options to display beautiful bright patterns.
【The Perfect Winter Gift for Your Family】 The LED Projection Lamp uses high-quality cards to deliver a bright and clear Image effect. A winter surprise for the family, spend the happy holidays with relatives together!

Decorated with it, your house will attract everyone’s attention at every carnival! Choose it, choose your amazing pleasure!

From the brand

For years, we have a love affair with multifunctional desk lamp. Our passion led us to design and produce the best desk lamp because you deserve the best. Our product provides consistent excellence quality and do it effortlessly. And we strive to provide all our customers from around the world with sincere service. It is our greatest honor to make you satisfied.

More than just lamp

LCD FUNCTION: You can press “On/Off button” for 3 seconds to turn on/off the LCD screen light. Includes a digital clock for time, date and temperature display. Set an alarm or time for your desk light. Remove clutter from your office desk!
EYE CARE TECH: Bright and eco-friendly LED lighting with an anti-glare shade. 5 levels of adjustable brightness for clear reading and studying without eye strain.
THREE MODULES: 3 colors temperature available(Warm White/ Natural White/ Cold White) for work(office), reading(studying), relaxation(bedroom) and more.
FOLDABLE DESIGN: LED desk lamp with 180 degree flexible arm and 90 degree base axis. The foldable design saves space and you can carry it anywhere in the office, living room, bedroom, dormitory and any other places.

Read more

Read more

Sleep Mode (Can turn off the blue light)

Intimate design, Long press the power button for 3 seconds to turn on / off the LCD display blue light, so you won’t be disturbed when you sleep at night.

Wireless charging & USB Charging Port

Suitable for Mobile phones with QI Wireless Charging Function.

Charge your mobile devices and keep them with reach.

A Light for All Occasions

From work to study, from reading to rest, this desk lamp provides all the lighting you need.

Read more

Eye-Caring Table Lamp

No flicker, less blue light and no glare lighting can protect your eyes from fatigue and vision

loss during reading drawing, working, etc.

Touch Control & Phone Holder

Light touch dimming, the light color temperature and brightness intensity can be adjusted freely.

Hiding smartphone holder, convenient for prop it up for viewing.

Perfect Gift Box

Perfect for anyone: A gift that everyone would love. Beautifully packaged and gift-ready for any occasion such as birthdays to special holidays.

Read more
